speak;Emma; Hey Mom!{w} Do you need help unpacking the supplies?
speak;Caroline; Please, take some from me.{w} I won't stop you.
speak;Emma; Jeez, this was all the stuff you had to carry?
speak;Caroline; That's a bit of it.{w} Believe me, I wish we had a quartermaster to help manage all of these supplies{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Oh, put that backpack in the tent corner.
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma;On it!
expression;Caroline;Smile
speak;Caroline; Heh, you don't have to pretend to be excited about unpacking.{w} I know it's boring as hell.
expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma;Hehe, I try to stay positive{tgm}...
expression;Emma;NoSmile
speak;Emma; Hey, Mom, can I ask you a question?
speak;Caroline; I suppose you just did, but I'll be kind and let you ask another for free.
speak;Emma; What was Dad like?{w} You never talk about him.
expression;Caroline;NoSmile
speak;Caroline; Your father{tgm}...

speak;Caroline; Well, he was a righteous man.{w} Helping people in need, giving supplies to the needy,{w} anything to help out those who needed helping.{w} One day, he took a trip to Sundar's capital and{tgm}...{tgm}never came back.
speak;Emma; So you think he died?
speak;Caroline; I prayed to the stars that it wasn't the case, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Well, I had to be realistic.{w} You can't kid yourself forever.
speak;Emma; Well, that's depressing{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Do either of us look like him?
speak;Caroline; You resemble your father more, and Emily is the spitting image of your real mother.
speak;Emma; Who you've said went on a trip to Rosefall and never came back.{w} And that's when you took us in as our adoptive mother.
speak;Caroline; That's why I'm strict with you girls,{w} and why I never let you leave.{w} I{tgm}...{tgm}didn't want to see you leave and never come back as well.
speak;Emma; Oh{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Well, that explains a lot.
speak;Emma; Maybe just let us have some fun once in a while, you know?{w} It can be suffocating when you're not allowed to do anything.
speak;Caroline; Ah, fine{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; I'll loosen the reins a bit.{w} If you or your sister get into trouble, though,{w} you'll get an earful after I save your hides.
speak;Emma; Oh boy, that sounds like it would be a sight to see...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; Alright, that should be everything unpacked.{w} Is there anything else I should do?
speak;Caroline; Lily and I are cooking dinner tonight, so just be back here soon, OK?

speak;Emma;Alright, Mom!
